com.github.mikephil.charting.formatter

Interface YAxisValueFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultYAxisValueFormatter, LargeValueFormatter, PercentFormatter

    public interface YAxisValueFormatter
    Created by Philipp Jahoda on 20/09/15. Custom formatter interface that allows formatting of YAxis labels before they are being drawn.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFormattedValue(float value, YAxis yAxis)
      Called when a value from the YAxis is formatted before being drawn.

    • Method Detail

      • getFormattedValue

        java.lang.String getFormattedValue(float value,
                                 YAxis yAxis)
        Called when a value from the YAxis is formatted before being drawn. For performance reasons, avoid excessive calculations and memory allocations inside this method.
        Parameters:
        value - the YAxis value to be formatted
        yAxis - the YAxis object the value belongs to
        Returns:
